uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Actor
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends Actor
    The ghosts are made of pure evil with the only purpose to chase and kill PacMan.

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int initX,
             int initY,
             Assets assets,
             MapScreen screen,
             com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture ghost)
        Create a new ghost
        Parameters:
        initX - starting x-coordinate
        initY - starting y-coordinate
        assets - the assets management of the game
        screen - the screen in which the ghost will be created
        ghost - name or path of the png-file that makes the ghost look beautiful

    • Method Detail

      • getDifficulty

        public Enemy.Difficulty getDifficulty()

      • notHome

        public void notHome()

      • resetDifficulty

        public void resetDifficulty()
        This method is needed, when SuperPacMan shrinks down to PacMan and the ghost needs to turn back to his assigned difficulty depending on the level.

      • setDifficulty

        public void setDifficulty(Enemy.Difficulty difficulty)
        In addition to normal setter methods, this one can keep the difficulty of the current level.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty that the ghost is supposed to adopt

      • setBoxTimer

        public void setBoxTimer(float timer)

      • collisionTest

        private boolean collisionTest(Actor target)
        Detects collisions with PacMan by comparing x- and y-distances.
        Parameters:
        target - PacMan
        Returns:
        true in case of a hit

      • findHome

        private Actor.Direction findHome()
        The ghost never forgets where it's home is. If it killed PacMan or if it got killed, it will use the A*-algorithm to rush back home.
        Returns:
        One of the four directions

      • findNextDirectionEasy

        private Actor.Direction findNextDirectionEasy(Actor target)
        If the ghost runs on EASY mode, it runs around randomly until it's close enough to PacMan. In the closer environment of PacMan the ghost calculates the x-/y-distance to PacMan primitively an chooses according to the result in which direction it will walk. It will also detect collisions with PacMan.
        Parameters:
        target - PacMan
        Returns:
        One of the four directions

      • findNextDirectionHard

        private Actor.Direction findNextDirectionHard(Actor target)
        If the ghost runs on HARD mode, it uses the A*-algorithm to find the shortest path that leads directly to PacMan. It also detects collisions with PacMan.
        Parameters:
        target - PacMan
        Returns:
        One of the four directions

      • findNextDirectionMedium

        private Actor.Direction findNextDirectionMedium(Actor target)
        If the ghost runs on MEDIUM mode, it runs around randomly until it's close enough to PacMan. In the closer environment of PacMan the ghost uses the A*-algorithm to find the shortest path that leads directly to PacMan. It will also detect collisions with PacMan.
        Parameters:
        target - PacMan
        Returns:
        One of the four directions

      • LeftOrRight

        private Actor.Direction LeftOrRight(int distance)
        Simply detects if PacMan is left or right the ghost.
        Parameters:
        distance - insert x-distance between ghost and PacMan
        Returns:
        Direction LEFT or RIGHT

      • runAway

        private Actor.Direction runAway(Actor hunter)
        This method shows the next tile to visit on the way to the as most secure assumed corner. The map will be divided in four quarters and the targeted tile will be the one in the extreme corner of the opposite quarter in which SuperPacMan is right now.
        Parameters:
        hunter - RUN! It's SuperPacMan!!
        Returns:
        Direction to the tile of retreat

      • UpOrDown

        private Actor.Direction UpOrDown(int distance)
        Simply detects if PacMan is above or beneath the ghost.
        Parameters:
        distance - insert y-distance between ghost and PacMan
        Returns:
        Direction UP or DOWN

      • enterBox

        public void enterBox()
        Make the ghost find his spot in the box. In this special way of moving, the ghost is able to pass WALLS.

      • findNextDirection

        public void findNextDirection(Actor target)
        Decide which method will be used to find the next direction to move depending on the difficulty.
        Parameters:
        target - PacMan

      • leaveBox

        public void leaveBox()
        Moves the ghost according to its current position until it has reached the HOME-position outside of the box. In this special way of moving, the ghost is able to pass WALLS.

      • getHome

        public void getHome()
        Increase the ghosts speed and find it's way home.

      • update

        public void update(float dt,
                   PacMan pacman)
        This update method checks the current state of the game to determine what each ghost needs to do next.
        Parameters:
        dt - time parameter used by libGDX
        pacman - PacMan
